```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
library(skimr)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- read_excel(here::here("Data/pharynx.xls"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(df)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- df %>%
  mutate(Sex = if_else(Sex == 2, "Female", "Male"))

unique(df$Sex)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

